column1: Enhancing Skills of Sri Lankan Tour Guides
A large segment of National TGs considers their job their passion as well as their main source of
income (58%), which is very important as they are trained considerably more than the others. A
similar  trend  can  be  found  among  the  Chauffeur TGs  and  Unlicensed TGs.  Nonetheless,  the
majority (61%) of Site and Area guides (61%) consider guiding as their main source of income
